overview:
Christian M. Lyons is a professional coach, educator, canine advocate, and award-winning writer in novel-length fiction, short fiction, creative non-fiction, screenplay, and poetry. His screenplays have been considered by some of the thoroughbreds in the industry like James Cameron and Barry Sonnenfeld. His work has appeared in The Bark, New York Magazine, On the Edge, Babel and his poetry appears in a line of products produced by Blue Mountain Arts.

Christian is currently Writer in Residence for Colorado Humanitiesâ€™ Writers in the Schools program (WITS).
